name: Captain America
description: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a 'Super-Soldier serum'. But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a warmonger and a terrorist organization.

name: Captain Marvel
description: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universeâ€™s most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

name: Iron Man
description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

name: The Incredible Hulk
description: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper.

name: Thor
description: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

name: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

name: Spider-Man: Far From Home
description: Peter Parker, the beloved superhero Spider-Man, faces four destructive elemental monsters while on holiday in Europe. Soon he receives help from Mysterio, a fellow hero with mysterious origins.

name: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

name: Thor: The Dark World
description: When the Dark Elves attempt to plunge the universe into darkness, Thor must embark on a perilous and personal journey that will reunite him with doctor Jane Foster.

name: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
description: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent Black Widow to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

name: THE ELECTRIC STATE
description: An orphaned teen hits the road with mysterious robot to find her long lost brother

name: MICKEY 17
description: Mickey 17, known as an 'expendable' goes on a dangerous journey to colonize an ice planet

name: INTERSTELLAR
description: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, some people are tasked to pilot a spacecraft with researchers to find a new planet for humans.

name: SHAZAM! FURY OF THE GODS
description: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word 'SHAZAM!', is transformed into his adult superhero alter ego, Shazam.

name: CAPTAIN AMERICA: BRAVE NEW WORLD
description: Sam Wilson, the new Captain America, finds himself in the middle of an international incident and must discover the motive behind a nefarious global plan.

name: Twisters
description: Kate Carter, a retired tornado-chaser and meteorologist, is persuaded to return to Oklahoma to work with a new team and new technologies.

name: Gladiator II
description: After his home is conquered by the tyrannical emperors who now lead Rome, Lucius is forced to enter the Colosseum and must look to his past to find strength to return the glory of Rome to its people.

name: Venom: The Last Dance
description: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as they're pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venom's home world.

name: The Hunger Games
description: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games: a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.

name: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
